english.segment1: Father finally I'm broken. Stretched so thin that I can hardly move. And all that I have left are the promises You've spoken to me. Father finally I'm shattered. A hollow shell of what I once thought true. And there is nothing left of things that used to matter to me
english.segment2: Lord, take me now. Cause I have got to get away from here somehow
english.segment3: Father don't be long tonight, I just need You by my side. I'm tearing out my insides and I've needed You alright. Let me look into Your eyes, All I need is You tonight. Hold me 'til I'm fast asleep and things will be alright
english.segment4: Father finally I'm happy. Where my sin was great Your grace abounds. And all that I have left is the hope that You have given to me. Lord take me now. Cause everything's alright when I'm with You somehow
english.segment5: And I'll wait for You tonight. I'll be still and know tonight, so Father don't be long tonight
